question: A friend of mine like to name his newborn son as "Ahad bin Asif".
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
The word 'Ahad' is the first number of the numerical order which means One.

In the context of defining Allah Ta'ala, it means Allah is One and He has no
partner. It is incorrect to name anyone Ahad as it is the sole quality of
Allah Ta'ala.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
